//activity_main Sign In Login Password
//activity_profile PROFILE NEW VIDEO SETTINGS Search videos.. This is your profile page :
You can perform multiple actions here :

 1.Changing your profile picture:
By clicking on your profile picture, a new window will pop up where you can select the profile picture you want to display from the gallery.

 2.Creating a new video:
In order to create a new video, simply click on the NEW VIDEO button.

 3.Changing your profile settings:
If you would like to change your profile settings such as your login, your password, your name or your occupation, simply click on the settings button.

 4.Searching and displaying a previously created video:
In order to search a video by name, simply make a single click on the input where Search videos.. is displayed. Once you find the video you're searching for, a simple click will display it. The information displayed for each video are in order : Video name, localisation, creation date and video length.

 5.Displaying the help menu:
In order to display the help menu, simply click on the blue button on the up right.

 6.Logging out:
In order to log out, simply click on the blue button on the up left.

//profile_settings Login Password Name Position UPDATE CANCEL This is the profile settings page :
You should fill all fields below :

 1.Login:
Enter your new login.

 2.Password:
Enter your new password.

 3.Name:
Enter your name.

 4.Position:
Enter your occupation.e.g, Senior Airport Controller.
//activity_newvideo Video Name Please enter your video name Location Please enter your location Reference Please enter your video reference Comment length Please enter your comment length in seconds Video Description START RECORDING UPLOAD VIDEO This is the new video creation page :
You should fill all fields below :

 1.Video Name:
Enter the name you want to give to your video.

 2.Location:
Enter the location the video was taken.

 3.Date:
Select the date the video was taken.

 4.Reference:
Enter the video reference.Any value is accepted at this stage of the application.

 5.Comment length:
Enter the comment length. The value must be between 1 and 10 seconds.

 6.Video description:
Enter the description of the video. A maximum of 200 letters is applicable.

Click on START RECORDING if you want to record a video using the camera or click on UPLOAD VIDEO if you want to upload a video from the SD CARD.

//activity_videopresentation VIDEO INFOS NEW VIDEO EDIT VIDEO General Infos Length: Location: Reviews: Last Edit: This is your video presentation page :
You can perform multiple actions here :

 1.Creating a new video:
In order to create a new video, simply click on the NEW VIDEO button.

 2.Edit your video by adding comments over it:
If you would like to edit your video, simply click on the EDIT VIDEO button.

 This video presentation page allows you to visualize your selected video. It also shows you some elementary information of it such as video description, length, location, number of reviews and the date of the last edit.


//activity_video2 delete circle increase size decrease size Export Sequence End Capture EXIT This is your video editing seen :
You can perform multiple actions here :

 1.Play/pause video:
Click on the play/pause button in order to play or pause the video.

 2.Forward Video:
Advance video by 4 seconds.

 3.Backward:
Move video back by 4 seconds.

 4.Adding a comment circle:
Only when the video is paused, Click on the + circle in order to add a comment circle to the scene. The comment will appear at the exact moment you added it in the video. It will be displayed for 2 seconds.

 5.Adding a comment text:
Only when the video is paused, While touching a circle with your index, click on the scene with your middle finger in order to add a comment text.

 6.Drag and Drop:
You can drag and drop comment circles and texts to where you want them tobe displayed.

 7.Delete comment circle:
Click on a comment circle then click the delete circle button in order to delete it.

 8.Edit comment text:
Only when the video is paused, While touching a comment text with your index, click on the scene with your middle finger in order to pop up a window where you can insert your new text.

 8.Delete comment text:
In order to delete comment text, simply in edit comment text mode, delete all characters. The comment will disappear.

 9.Increase/Decrease comment circle size:
Click on a comment circle then click the increase size/decrease size button in order to change the comment circle size.

 10.Export the scene to a video file:
In order to export the scene to a video file, simply click on the record sequence button and allow permissions. The video will restart over and a scene export will take place. At the end, a success message will be displayed and you can check your video in the ScreenRecSample Directory under newspecapprepository. This feature is only available for Android 5.0 and above.

 11.Exit:
Click on exit button to exit edit mode.

 12.Change sound volume:
Move the green slider in order to change the video playing sound. This action will have no effect over the exported video files.

 12.Navigate video:
Move the blue slider in order to navigate in the video timeline.
